text: Loretta Swit (born Loretta Jane Szwed; November 4, 1937 - May 30, 2025) was an American actress. She was most famous for her role as Margaret Houlihan on the M*A*S*H TV series. Swit died on May 30, 2025 at her home in New York City from natural causes, aged 87. ==References== == Other websites== Category:1937 births Category:2025 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from New Jersey Category:People from Passaic, New Jersey Category:Emmy Award winning actors
title: Loretta Swit
